name: Riverhill Trials
description: Riverhill Trials is a first person, 3D PLATFORMER ADVENTURE with a dynamic environment. Fly your Space Ship, land on the strange planet and overcome its challenges: moving platforms, falling asteroids, traps and alien structures - you will be tested.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i5 2400 / AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 660 Ti / AMD RX 560 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel i5 4670k /  Ryzen 5 1600 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 770 / R9 280 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
